txt.en: Bergil calls out to the boys and girls before the Old Guest-house.\n\n'It is time! Time for the Finder's Gathering!'
Bergil can be found in front of the Old Guest-house, in the First Circle, just south of the City Gates.\n\nTalk to Bergil to join the children in the Finder's Gathering.
'Come, [placeholder]. We shouldn't want to keep them waiting!'
It is time for the Finder's Gathering to begin.
'Come, [placeholder]. We shouldn't want to keep them waiting!'
'Come, [placeholder]. The Finder's Gathering begins. We wouldn't want to keep them waiting!'
